author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ICT Group Intends To Acquire Remaining 50 Pct Stake In InTraffic ‍​
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - ICT GROUP NV:
* INTENDS TO ACQUIRE REMAINING 50% STAKE IN INTRAFFIC FROM JOINT VENTURE PARTNER MOVARES ‍​
* CLOSING OF TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED END OF MARCH 2018 * ‍INTRAFFIC WILL BE FULLY CONSOLIDATED AS FROM CLOSING OF TRANSACTION​
* PURCHASE CONSIDERATION FOR 50% OF THE SHARES WILL BE PAID IN CASH Source text : bit.ly/2nHwT78 Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
